name: Secondary
description:
Secondary

A simple action game about creating a secondary.  Grow your planet and watch it ignite!

Hover over the projectile masses emitted by the anomaly.  Then click in the desired direction to change their trajectory.  Absorb the regular masses to gain mass.  Avoid the mysterious projectiles though!

Used the Godot Engine.

Art: kenney.nl

This was an entry for the 2022 Kenney Game Jam.

Follow me at @sundlegames | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqpQ35BqOlZ5JgybAjFHPKw/
